import MethodEndpoint from '@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint';
import ParamsDetails from '@theme/ParamsDetails';
import RequestSchema from '@theme/RequestSchema';
import StatusCodes from '@theme/StatusCodes';
import OperationTabs from '@theme/OperationTabs';
import TabItem from '@theme/TabItem';
import Heading from '@theme/Heading';

<Heading
  as={'h1'}
  className={'openapi__heading'}
  children={'createProjectSnapshot'}
></Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={'post'}
  path={'/api/v1/snapshots/{username}/{slug}'}
  context={'endpoint'}
></MethodEndpoint>

createProjectSnapshot

<Heading
  id={'request'}
  as={'h2'}
  className={'openapi-tabs__heading'}
  children={'Request'}
></Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[
    {
      schema: { type: 'string', example: 'johndoe', description: 'Username' },
      required: true,
      description: 'Username',
      name: 'username',
      in: 'path',
    },
    {
      schema: {
        type: 'string',
        example: 'my-novel',
        description: 'Project slug',
      },
      required: true,
      description: 'Project slug',
      name: 'slug',
      in: 'path',
    },
  ]}
></ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={'Body'}
  body={{
    content: {
      'application/json': {
        schema: {
          type: 'object',
          properties: {
            documentId: { type: 'string' },
            name: { type: 'string', minLength: 1, maxLength: 255 },
            description: { type: 'string', maxLength: 1000 },
            yDocState: { type: 'string' },
            stateVector: { type: 'string' },
            wordCount: { type: 'number' },
            metadata: {
              type: 'object',
              additionalProperties: { nullable: true },
            },
          },
          required: ['documentId', 'name', 'yDocState'],
          title: 'CreateSnapshotRequest',
        },
      },
    },
  }}
></RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{
    '201': {
      description: 'Snapshot created successfully',
      content: {
        'application/json': {
          schema: {
            type: 'object',
            properties: {
              id: { type: 'string' },
              documentId: { type: 'string' },
              name: { type: 'string' },
              description: { type: 'string', nullable: true },
              wordCount: { type: 'number', nullable: true },
              metadata: {
                type: 'object',
                nullable: true,
                additionalProperties: { nullable: true },
              },
              createdAt: { type: 'string', format: 'date-time' },
            },
            required: ['id', 'documentId', 'name', 'createdAt'],
            title: 'DocumentSnapshot',
          },
        },
      },
    },
    '400': {
      description: 'Invalid input data',
      content: {
        'application/json': {
          schema: {
            type: 'object',
            properties: { error: { type: 'string' } },
            required: ['error'],
            example: { error: 'An error occurred' },
            title: 'ErrorResponse',
          },
        },
      },
    },
    '401': {
      description: 'Not authenticated',
      content: {
        'application/json': {
          schema: {
            type: 'object',
            properties: { error: { type: 'string' } },
            required: ['error'],
            example: { error: 'An error occurred' },
            title: 'ErrorResponse',
          },
        },
      },
    },
    '403': {
      description: 'Access denied - not project owner',
      content: {
        'application/json': {
          schema: {
            type: 'object',
            properties: { error: { type: 'string' } },
            required: ['error'],
            example: { error: 'An error occurred' },
            title: 'ErrorResponse',
          },
        },
      },
    },
    '404': {
      description: 'Project not found',
      content: {
        'application/json': {
          schema: {
            type: 'object',
            properties: { error: { type: 'string' } },
            required: ['error'],
            example: { error: 'An error occurred' },
            title: 'ErrorResponse',
          },
        },
      },
    },
  }}
></StatusCodes>
